articles.author: Jeff Stein
articles.title: U.S., allies take key step toward funding Ukraine with Russian assets - The Washington Post
articles.description: Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen is close to securing European support for a plan to repurpose seized Russian assets for Ukraine.
articles.content:
The United States and its Western allies took a key step Saturday toward using frozen Russian assets to fund Ukraines war effort, moving closer to providing another key financial stream for Kyiv.

articles.content:
